Class BarometricHTSensor

java.lang.Object
  lejos.nxt.I2CSensor
      lejos.nxt.addon.BarometricHTSensor
All Implemented Interfaces:
SensorConstants
public class BarometricHTSensor
extends I2CSensor

This class supports the HiTechnic barometric sensor.

Author:
Matthias Paul Scholz

Method Detail

getPressureImperial

public long getPressureImperial()
Returns:
the barometric pressure measured by the sensor in units of 1/1000 inches of mercury (inHg).

getPressureMetric

public long getPressureMetric()
Returns:
the barometric pressure measured by the sensor in units of 1/10 hectopascals (hPa).

recalibrate

public void recalibrate(int calibrationImperial)
Re-calibrates the sensor.

Parameters:
calibrationImperial - the recalibration value in units of 1/1000 inches of mercury (inHg).

getCalibrationImperial

public int getCalibrationImperial()
Returns:
the present calibration value in units of of 1/1000 inches of mercury (inHg). Will be 0 in case no explicit recalibration has been performed.

getCalibrationMetric

public int getCalibrationMetric()
Returns:
the present calibration value in units of of 1/10 hectopascals (hPa). Will be 0 in case no explicit recalibration has been performed.
